Model.ScoreBoard

Class ScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.ScoreBoard.ScoreBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    YatzyScoreBoard

    public class ScoreBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    ScoreBoard is a class representing a real life scoreboard, basically a two-dimensional grid of numbers, where the each cell may be filled with a number, be empty or crossed over.
    Author:
    Isak, Marianna, Gustav

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScoreBoard(int rows, int columns)
      Class constructor specifying the number of rows and columns the scoreboard should have
